summary: Ever wanted to feel like a Daedric prince? Came t the right place.
descriptionHtml:
This mod turns the player to the all mighty Sheogorath.

This includes:
Teleportation spells
Various spells from Sheogoraths Daedric artifacts
Enhanced Illusion anc Conjuration spells

Extremely powerfull set of Sheogoraths outfit
As well as a new follower \"Mad Jester\"

This is my first mod and now currently also the first version. There are not bugs that I am aware of but I will love feed back and requests, and bug reports as well.
I plan on adding more spells later on, and having an ingame way of obtaining them.
Currently obtaining the spells and outfit requires the console.
I will explain how to install, and how to use the console to get the items in a text file that I will provide in the bundle.
My main priority as if now is actually shape shifting spells and expanding on more teleportaion later on.

UPDATE 1.2
Adds new spells and teleportaion spells goes to NewSheoth castle filled with charactors from The Shivering Isles expansion, theyre all modled after the original ones as well.



Have fun!
author: Dazzor
